Entries.Indoor_Day_0: Ahh... there's nothing like a good night's sleep next to my {{Lowercase: {{Random: {{Hana.GNMTokens/SpouseNoun}} }} }}!$h
Entries.Outdoor_3: Look at us, with our little farm. We make a cute couple.$h
Entries.Good_1: You're so {{Random: {{Hana.GNMTokens/Adjective}} }}... have I told you that?$l
